name: Enigma Gaming
additional_notices:
The following token has a variable tax function on the smart contract to change tax rates post deployment.
Do your own research and be careful if you are trading this token.

description.en:
What is the project about?
Enigma Gaming is an innovative decentralized platform designed to create a seamless and immersive online gaming experience. 
Our mission is to empower gamers and developers worldwide by providing cutting-edge tools, decentralized gaming infrastructure, and an engaging environment to foster collaboration and creativity. 


What makes your project unique?
We will be the first decentrilized online esports arena where players create their own matches and tournaments

History of your project.
A company of friends decided to fulfill the dream of millions of people, to help them touch the world of eSports

What’s next for your project?
development

What can your token be used for?
to use on our platform (payment)
